sub_title: HR I Expatriate Management I Internationalisation I Sinologist
summary:
A Dutch HR professional with broad international work experience, a good feel for cross-cultural differences and fluent in Dutch, English and Mandarin Chinese. Delivering high-quality service to people is my passion. My strong interpersonal and communication skills allow me to understand what people need and helps me to detect barriers in an early stage. I exhibit a high level of confidentiality and I am a good team player full of integrity who enjoys brainstorming and exchange ideas to design the best solutions for stakeholders. I'm a big supporter of applying innovative and modern technology to enhance work efficiency. With my intercultural background and advanced self-management skills, I have been successful in dealing with the many cultural and business challenges that China has brought to me. 

After my twin pregnancy, i mainly performed administrative tasks in the past three years. I’m available for new challenges in the Netherlands.

projects:
[{'title': 'Corporate Social Responsibility Beanstalk International Bilingual School', 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'description': 'I organized the company visit for more than one hundred 4th graders from Beanstalk International Bilingual School (BIBS).

Goldwind is committing itself to a better future for mankind through the development of clean energy and facilitating solutions to solve social and environmental problems. The goal was to provide the students of Beanstalk an understanding of green energy and advocate for the conversation of energy and the protection of the environment. During the company visit, the students received a presentation on global climate change and the development of green energy, got the opportunity to see our greenhouse where we produce vegetables with the energy from wind and solar, the micro-grid system to storage energy, the inside of a wind turbine nacelle and hub. Overall the company visit was more than successful and has become a part of the student learnings field trips.
', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Xu Len', 'last_name': 'P.', 'name': None, 'headline': 'HR I Expatriate Management I Internationalisation I Sinologist'}]}]
